description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are a Wabbit. Stomping is your weapon. Stomp your way across 50 solo challenges or three local multiplayer modes with or without bots. Easy and fun to play for any skill level guarantees enjoyment for you and your buddies!
